page.title: 04Modern Recreation Complex
page.content: Leisure facilities are ample with the children's games room,indoor swimming pool,jacuzzi,two solarias,sauna,squash courts and outdoor tennis court. On 7th July of this year, the owners are opening a new recreational complex in the grounds of Park House Hotel. Four lakes and six hills.One lake with trout and three with Chinese goldfish.Also ducks,geese and doves on the island in the centre of the biggest lake. An adventure area with sand pit, dolls houses, cowboy fort,climbing frames, slides, seesaws, galleon and aeroplane swings, tea room,ice cream and souvenir shop. Leisure room with aquarium, rat city, live puppet show, model railway and small museum.Pets corner with baby goats,calves,pigs and lambs.
